name: Goblin Keep
description:
Explore a world enhanced by extreme view distance and lush visuals created with Unreal engine and new voxel technology.

Destroy

Play with full destruction physics using a custom system created with multiplayer in mind.

Fight

Loot weapons, cast spells, and fight animals and characters to survive.

Build

Quickly plan with building tools, then recruit villagers to have them build.

Attack and Defend

Use siege weapons and magic to attack a friend's town or defend your own.

Craft and Trade

Craft everything needed to start a town, then trade with your trader to buy crops to harvest. A Hunger system provides the need to eat as to not lose Max HP, but the option overeat to gain Max HP.

Relax

Get lost in a soundtrack of over two hours of sublime retro-inspired adventurous music, including 90 minutes by professional composer Claudia Correia.
